title: The Golden Table
description: July 4th, 1502 the Spanish flagship El Dorado sinks off the western coast of Puerto Rico carrying among other gold cargo destined for King Ferdinand and Queen Isabella, the Golden Table, a 1.5 ton gift from the infamous governor Francisco de Bobadilla.Peter Colburn has been bumming around south Florida his whole life chasing his two loves, tarpon and women. Fly fishing the Florida flats and working by day, trolling the bars and dodging old flames by night made up the routine he called life. A very good looking man, things always came easy for Peter. Too easy, which now equates to boredom with Florida. Answering a classified ad, Peter sets out on an adventure filled with mystery, treasure, women, and danger under the seas of the Caribbean in search of the lost Golden Table. From Florida to Puerto Rico to Belize, Peter discovers romance and love, his precious tarpon and...
author: James  Oliver
